author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> incase anyone missed it, the rollcall recording: https://youtu.be/M2v6Rv2XE_o

author: bridge-bot
content:
<oneski22> h/t to @amarrazza for flagging
At Polygon we are working towards a change in our next hard fork to raise the max contract size to 32kb (https://forum.polygon.technology/t/pip-30-increase-max-code-size-limit-to-32kb/13266)

If interest from other teams we are more than happy to convert this into a RIP and align with others to ensure we all go about this in a standardized way!
